name: ROBOMAN Saves the Neighborhood
description:
It's time for ROBOMAN to get rid of those MOTH DUDES and hopefully bring peace to the neighborhood!
Despite being a futuristic robot, ROBOMAN can't go a second without losing a screw, FIX HIM UP by typing quickly before the MOTH DUDES get you! ROBOMAN carries his trusty gun™ to defeat those DUDES. Problem is, this gun™ is also busted! REPAIR the gun™ by clicking the cogs and shoot!
Will ROBOMAN use violence or will he try to reason with the MOTH DUDES?
You decide...
